history.content: {"status": "need_clarification", "assistant_message": "To create an L bracket, I need more details about its dimensions, plane, and thickness.", "questions": ["What are the dimensions of the L bracket?", "Which plane should the L bracket be created on?", "What is the thickness of the L bracket?"], "plan": [], "actions": [], "requires_confirmation": false}
you choose dimensions and on xy plane. thickness 5mm

{"status": "ready_to_execute", "assistant_message": "I will create an L bracket on the XY plane with arms of 5cm each and a thickness of 0.5cm.", "questions": [], "plan": ["1.
